ComicInfo.Title: none; Captain Threepio; The One That Got Away; The Secret Tales of Luke's Hand; Death Star Pirates; Bad Business
ComicInfo.Summary:
Han tells Anakin a bed time story about Luke Skywalker's hand.
Luke, Han and the rest of the crew battle space pirates.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 07:33:42. [CVDB97451] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:41:15. [Issue ID 214993]
